events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the highway, requesting to file a claim for the damages sustained.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the report involving a vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the investigation and follow up on the customer's auto accident claim.
Acknowledgment of the claim filing has been sent to the customer to confirm receipt and next steps.
The claims agent requested the customer to submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including the police report, photographs, and mechanic’s repair quotation.
The investigation into the auto accident claim began with a review of submitted evidence and initial assessment.
Investigation concluded confirming that the accident was covered under the insurance policy with no fraudulent activity.
A settlement offer was drafted based on the damage evaluation and communicated to the customer for review.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed willingness to proceed promptly.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department following positive feedback and verification.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and transferred to the customer’s listed account.
The claim file was closed after payment confirmation and completion of all administrative steps.
The closed auto accident claim was archived in the system in accordance with company record retention policies.
